name: The Reptilian Vampire Killer (Wis Build edition)

posts.author: francois.demers.4
posts.content:
Hey you! Yes you! The person reading this! You like Castlevania? You like lizards? Say no more! Here's something just for you! I present you: The REPTILIAN VAMPIRE KILLER!!!

Warning: Thisbuildisforrolepaypurposemainlythereforenotaseriouspvporpvmbuild. Theauthorofthisbuildisnotresponsibleofanystrugglethereadermayhavewhileplayingwiththisbuild.

With this, you should be able to fight... vampire furries? Furry vampires? Whatever, you know what you want to fight so I won't bother any further with this. Now, let's stop wasting space and get to the real deal.

Race: Human
Classes: Druid 14, Monk 9, Shifter 17
Alignment: LN for monk and druid levels

First, the attributes:

Str: 10 to minize early-game struggle with hitting
Dex: 10 to minimize early-game struggle with avoiding hits
Con: 16 since none of the lizardfolk shapes have their own Con
Wis 16 (32) To get more AC and harder-to-avoid druid spells
Int: 14 to satisfy all your needs of skills
Cha: 8 because who cares? You're a lizard, Harry!

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
I had a good laugh at your hilarious disclaimer! And you definitely get a lizard, and even a giant lizard (dragon) eventually. I have close to zero experience with lizard shape, and I don't see many builds with focus on that shape. But I bet it can be fun to roleplay one ending as a dragon.
As for the build itself, your BAB will improve by 2 if you have a 4/8/8 level distribution at level 20, but I see that it will delay your epic lizard shape.
